Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.5 Rūpīduka » 2.5.3 Paccayavāra » 2.5.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.5.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Cūḷantaraduka
Rūpīduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
101.
774Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (Paṭiccasadisaṃ.) (1)
775Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  vatthuṃ paccayā arūpino khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
776Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  vatthuṃ paccayā arūpino khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (Evaṃ avasesā pañhā, pavattipaṭisandhi vibhajitabbā.) (3)
<< 2.5.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇa >>
